name: Philips Fuzzy Logic Rice Cooker DIGITAL-JAR 1.8L HD4515/67
description: The Philips HD4515/67 rice cooker features Smart 3D heating, ensuring that heat circulates from the top, bottom, and sides for evenly cooked grains. Its durable Bakuhanseki-coated inner pot, which is six times harder, preserves the pan’s quality and flavors. The large LCD touchscreen provides easy access to 8 preset cooking menus, while the automatic Keep-Warm mode maintains temperature for up to 24 hours. Its detachable inner lid simplifies cleaning and maintenance.

name: Sencor STS 5070SS Stainless Steel Toaster (4-Slice)
description: The Sencor STS 5070SS toaster combines sleek stainless-steel design with high performance, offering four wide slots to suit both thin and thick bread slices. It delivers customizable toasting with 9 intensity settings, including defrost, reheat, and cancel functions. An automatic bread centering system ensures even browning, and features like high-lift, bun-warming rack, and a removable crumb tray add user convenience.

name: IFB Washing Machine Senator Aqua SX 8kg 1400RPM
description: The IFB Senator Aqua SX is an 8kg fully automatic front-load washing machine equipped with 3D Wash and Aqua Energie technology for thorough cleaning. With a maximum spin speed of 1400 RPM, it ensures faster drying while being gentle on fabrics. The machine includes multiple wash programs, child lock, and a delay start option.

specifications.Features: 3D Wash, Aqua Energie, Child Lock, Delay Start

name: Vivax WH-175L Electric Kettle 1.7L 2200W
description: The Vivax WH-175L is a powerful 2200W kettle with a 1.7L capacity, ideal for quick boiling. It features a concealed heating element to reduce scale build-up and ensure easy cleaning. Equipped with a water level indicator and auto shut-off safety function, it combines convenience with safety.

name: Kenstar Ester ABS Plastic Mixer Grinder 750W
description: The Kenstar Ester is a powerful 750W mixer grinder designed for heavy-duty mixing and grinding tasks. With multiple speed settings and durable stainless steel blades, it can handle a variety of ingredients. Its ABS plastic body ensures long-lasting strength and lightweight handling.

name: Multifunctional Food Processor
description: This multifunctional food processor offers versatile functions including chopping, slicing, blending, and dough kneading. It comes with multiple attachments and safety lock mechanisms, making it an all-in-one solution for kitchen food preparation. Ideal for households that require efficiency and variety in cooking.

name: Zanussi Washing Machine 8kg 1200RPM
description: The Zanussi 8kg front-load washing machine delivers efficient cleaning performance with a maximum spin speed of 1200 RPM. Designed with user-friendly programs and safety features, it ensures convenience for everyday laundry. Its durable design makes it a reliable household appliance.

specifications.Features: Multiple wash programs, Safety child lock

name: Sharp 42L Electronic Convection Oven
description: The Sharp 42L convection oven combines large capacity with advanced heating for even cooking. Perfect for baking, grilling, or roasting, it provides multiple temperature settings and a timer for precise control. The interior light and durable design make it suitable for daily kitchen use.

name: Philips Fuzzy-Logic Rice Cooker DIGITAL-JAR 1.8L HD4515/67
description: The Philips HD4515/67 rice cooker uses Smart 3D heat distribution to ensure even heating from all sides, delivering perfectly cooked rice. Its durable Bakuhanseki-coated inner pot is six times harder, offering long-lasting performance. Featuring a large LCD panel with 8 preset programs and detachable inner lid for easy cleaning, plus a Keep-Warm function that lasts up to 24 hours.

name: Sencor Stainless Steel Toaster STS 5070SS (4-Slice)
description: The Sencor STS 5070SS is a sleek stainless steel toaster with four wide slots and nine browning levels. It features auto shut-off, defrost, reheat, and cancel functions. High-lift lever, removable crumb tray, auto centering, and bun-warming rack make it user-friendly and convenient.

specifications.Special Features: High-lift lever, auto centering, bun-warming rack

name: IFB Senator Aqua SX 8 kg Washing Machine, 1400 RPM
description: The IFB Senator Aqua SX front-load washing machine features 3D Wash and Aqua Energie for deep cleaning. With a max spin speed of 1400 RPM and multiple wash programs, it offers customizable performance. Features include a child lock, delay start, LED display, and sturdy stainless-steel drum.

specifications.Features: 3D Wash, Aqua Energie, Child lock, Delay start

name: Vivax WH-175L Electric Kettle 1.7 L, 2200 W
description: This Vivax WH-175L kettle boils up to 1.7 L of water quickly with its 2200 W concealed heating element. It features auto shut-off, boil-dry protection, and a water-level window. The ergonomic design, cord storage base, and easy-pour spout make it a practical kitchen companion.

name: Kenstar Ester 750 W Mixer Grinder (ABS Body)
description: The Kenstar Ester mixer grinder is powered by a robust 750 W motor suitable for grinding, blending, and mixing tasks. It includes stainless-steel jars with sharp blades and has a durable ABS body. Designed for safety and convenience, it features a jar locking system and non-slip feet.

name: The Lean Startup by Eric Ries (Book)
description: ‘The Lean Startup’ by Eric Ries offers a systematic, scientific approach for creating and managing successful startups in an age when companies must innovate frequently. The book presents the ‘Build–Measure–Learn’ methodology, empowering entrepreneurs to steer their product development through validated learning and iterative design.

name: Atomic Habits by James Clear (Book)
description: ‘Atomic Habits’ by James Clear explains how tiny changes in habits can lead to significant improvements over time. With practical strategies and real-world examples, the author demonstrates how to build good habits, break bad ones, and master the tiny behaviors that lead to remarkable results.

name: Samsung 55-inch Crystal UHD 4K Smart TV (2025, UN55U8000F)
description: The Samsung UN55U8000F is a 55-inch Crystal UHD 4K smart TV that delivers sharp visuals with vibrant colors, driven by the Crystal Processor 4K. It features a sleek, minimalist Metal Stream design and supports popular streaming platforms integrated through the Tizen OS. Its Smart TV interface and Samsung Knox security make content navigation and usage sound and intuitive.

name: Dell Latitude 5530 Laptop (Intel i7-1255U)
description: The Dell Latitude 5530 is a business-class 15.6-inch laptop powered by the Intel Core i7-1255U (12th Gen), boasting high efficiency with 2+8 cores and speeds up to 4.7 GHz. It includes Intel Iris Xe graphics, multiple connectivity ports, and enterprise-grade security features, making it ideal for professionals on the go.

specifications.Processor: 12th Gen Intel Core i7-1255U (2P+8E, up to 4.7 GHz)

name: Canon EOS RP Mirrorless Full-Frame Camera
description: The Canon EOS RP is a compact full-frame mirrorless camera powered by the DIGIC 8 processor and equipped with a 26.2MP CMOS sensor. It features Canon’s Dual Pixel CMOS AF system with 4,779 selectable focus points, Eye AF, and captures both UHD 4K and Full HD footage. Lightweight and user-friendly, it delivers excellent image quality for photography enthusiasts.

specifications.Autofocus: Dual Pixel AF (4,779 points), Eye AF

name: Samsung Odyssey G55C 27-inch Curved QHD Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G55C is a 27-inch curved gaming monitor featuring a QHD (2560×1440) VA panel, a fast 165 Hz refresh rate, and 1 ms MPRT response time. The immersive 1000R curve, AMD FreeSync Premium Pro support, and vibrant HDR10 visuals make it perfect for responsive and immersive gameplay.

name: HP Victus 15-inch Gaming Laptop (Intel Core i5, GTX 1650)
description: The HP Victus 15-fa07xx gaming laptop combines a 12th Gen Intel Core i5 processor with an NVIDIA GTX 1650 GPU, delivering solid full-HD gaming performance. Complete with 8 GB RAM, 256 GB SSD, and Windows 11 Home, it’s an affordable yet capable option for casual gamers looking for a budget-friendly gaming rig.

name: Handheld 1D/2D QR Barcode Scanner
description: This handheld barcode scanner offers versatile decoding of 1D, 2D, and QR codes. Designed for retail or point-of-sale use, it provides quick, reliable scanning even on damaged or poorly printed codes. Its ergonomic grip and corded configuration make it durable and comfortable for extended use.

name: Large Venue 3LCD Laser Projector (≈4500 lm)
description: This large-venue projector uses 3LCD laser technology to deliver vivid images up to 4500 lumens of both color and white brightness, ideal for auditoriums, conference halls, and houses of worship. It supports WUXGA resolution with true-to-life colors and long-term reliability thanks to its laser light source.

name: HP DeskJet 2710e All-in-One Wireless Printer
description: The HP DeskJet 2710e is a budget-friendly all-in-one printer offering printing, scanning, and copying. It includes dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and works with the HP Smart app for seamless mobile printing. With eco-conscious design featuring over 20% recycled plastic and speeds of up to 7.5 ppm (black) and 5.5 ppm (color), it’s perfect for home use.

name: HIKVISION 4K Outdoor PTZ Security Camera
description: The Hikvision 4K PTZ outdoor security camera provides ultra-high-definition surveillance with 4K resolution and pan-tilt-zoom functionality. Designed for outdoor use, it offers robust weather resistance, night vision, and advanced motion detection for reliable 24/7 monitoring.

name: Lenovo Legion R27fc-30 27-inch Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Lenovo Legion R27fc-30 is a 27-inch curved gaming monitor featuring Full HD resolution, a 280 Hz overclockable refresh rate, and AMD FreeSync Premium. Its 1500R curvature and HDR10 support deliver smooth, immersive visuals for competitive gaming.

name: Samsung 55-inch Crystal UHD 4K Smart TV
description: Samsung’s 55-inch Crystal UHD 4K Smart TV delivers lifelike picture quality with the Crystal Processor 4K and a sleek slim design. Integrated Tizen OS provides access to all major streaming platforms, while Samsung Knox ensures secure and smooth operation.

name: Dell Latitude 5530 Laptop (Core i7-1255U, 8GB, SSD)
description: The Dell Latitude 5530 is a professional-grade laptop powered by the 12th Gen Intel Core i7-1255U. With 8GB RAM, fast SSD storage, and business-class security, it’s designed for productivity and multitasking with a lightweight yet durable build.

name: Canon EOS RP Mirrorless Full-Frame Camera
description: The Canon EOS RP is a compact and lightweight full-frame mirrorless camera with a 26.2MP sensor and DIGIC 8 processor. It supports 4K video recording, Dual Pixel CMOS AF with Eye Detection, and is perfect for enthusiasts seeking professional image quality in a portable body.

specifications.AF System: Dual Pixel CMOS AF, Eye Detection

name: Samsung Odyssey G55C 27-inch QHD Curved Gaming Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G55C offers immersive gaming on a 27-inch QHD VA panel with a 1000R curve. Featuring a 165 Hz refresh rate, 1 ms response time, and AMD FreeSync Premium Pro, it provides ultra-smooth visuals for fast-paced gaming.

name: HP Victus Gaming Laptop (8GB RAM, SSD)
description: The HP Victus is a 15.6-inch gaming laptop equipped with 8GB RAM and fast SSD storage. It balances performance and affordability, making it a great choice for casual gamers and students looking for a reliable gaming-ready laptop.

name: Handheld 1D/2D/QR Barcode Scanner
description: A durable handheld barcode scanner designed for retail and POS systems. It can read 1D, 2D, and QR codes quickly and accurately, even on damaged or poorly printed labels, ensuring smooth and reliable checkout operations.

name: High-Brightness Large Venue Mapping Projector
description: A professional-grade projector designed for large venues, auditoriums, and event halls. It delivers crystal-clear visuals with high brightness and mapping capabilities, making it ideal for presentations, exhibitions, and immersive displays.

name: HP DeskJet 2710 All-in-One Wireless Printer
description: The HP DeskJet 2710 is a compact all-in-one printer that offers wireless printing, scanning, and copying. Ideal for home and small office use, it features easy setup, mobile printing via HP Smart app, and energy efficiency.

name: HIKVISION 4K Outdoor PTZ Security Camera
description: A weatherproof 4K PTZ outdoor surveillance camera by Hikvision. It offers ultra-HD video recording, pan-tilt-zoom control, infrared night vision, and smart motion detection, making it ideal for professional-grade security systems.

name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)
description: The AirPods Pro (2nd Gen) feature Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Transparency, and personalized spatial audio. With an improved H2 chip, up to 6 hours of listening time, and MagSafe charging, they provide an immersive, premium wireless audio experience.

specifications.Battery Life: Up to 6 hours (30 hours with case)

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic (Bluetooth, 47mm)
description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic combines timeless design with advanced health and fitness tracking. Featuring a rotating bezel, AMOLED display, and Wear OS powered by Samsung, it offers heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and seamless connectivity with Galaxy devices.

specifications.Features: Heart rate, SpO2, sleep tracking, GPS

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Sony’s WH-1000XM5 headphones deliver industry-leading noise cancellation with two processors and 8 microphones. Featuring a lightweight design, 30 hours of battery life, quick charging, and immersive high-resolution audio, they are perfect for travel and everyday listening.

name: Women's Elegant Evening Maxi Dress
description: A stunning women's elegant evening maxi dress designed for formal events, parties, and special occasions. Made with premium fabric, it features a flattering fit, graceful silhouette, and timeless style.

name: Women's White Casual Sneakers
description: Comfortable and stylish women’s white casual sneakers suitable for everyday wear. Lightweight with a cushioned sole, they combine fashion with practicality for both casual outings and active lifestyles.

name: Modern Ergonomic Office Chair
description: A modern ergonomic office chair designed for maximum comfort and productivity. Features adjustable height, breathable mesh back support, and cushioned seating for long working hours. Perfect for home or corporate offices.

name: Xiaomi Redmi 13C (6GB RAM, Dual SIM)
description: The Redmi 13C offers excellent performance with 6GB RAM and dual SIM capability. Featuring a large HD+ display, long-lasting battery, and a triple-camera setup, it is a great choice for budget-conscious users seeking reliability.

name: OPPO A18 (128GB, 4GB RAM, Glowing Black)
description: The OPPO A18 combines elegant design with practical performance. Featuring 128GB storage, 4GB RAM, a vibrant display, and a long-lasting battery, it is built for smooth everyday use.

name: Infinix Smart (4GB RAM, 64GB Storage, Galaxy White)
description: A stylish budget smartphone from Infinix featuring 4GB RAM, 64GB storage, and an elegant Galaxy White finish. Delivers smooth performance for daily tasks and essential apps.

name: Xiaomi Redmi 13C (8GB RAM, Dual SIM)
description: An upgraded Redmi 13C variant with 8GB RAM for faster multitasking and smoother performance. Equipped with a large HD+ display, robust battery, and AI camera system, it is a powerful mid-range smartphone.

name: Infinix Hot 40i (4+4GB RAM, 128GB Storage)
description: The Infinix Hot 40i is a balanced smartphone featuring extended RAM (4GB + 4GB), 128GB storage, and a sleek design. Delivers reliable performance for gaming, streaming, and multitasking.

name: Infinix Smart 6 Plus (Miracle Black)
description: The Infinix Smart 6 Plus features a sleek Miracle Black design, big display, and dependable performance for daily use. It’s a cost-effective smartphone with long battery life and smooth functionality.

name: OPPO Reno11 5G (12GB RAM, 256GB Storage)
description: The OPPO Reno11 5G offers flagship-level performance with 12GB RAM and 256GB storage. It features a 120Hz AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and an advanced triple-camera system for photography lovers.

name: Xiaomi Redmi 13C (6GB RAM, Dual SIM)
description: Another Redmi 13C variant with 6GB RAM and dual SIM support. Combines reliable performance, a large display, and a strong battery to deliver excellent value for money.

name: OPPO A18 (128GB, 4GB RAM, Glowing Black)
description: The OPPO A18 offers smooth everyday performance with 4GB RAM and 128GB storage. Featuring a sleek Glowing Black finish, HD+ display, and a powerful battery, it is designed for long-lasting usage.

name: Infinix Smart (4GB RAM, 64GB, Galaxy White)
description: The Infinix Smart in Galaxy White delivers value with 4GB RAM and 64GB storage. Perfect for essential apps, casual browsing, and day-to-day communication with an elegant design.

name: Xiaomi Redmi 13C Dual SIM (8GB RAM)
description: The Redmi 13C with 8GB RAM provides smooth multitasking and reliable performance. Dual SIM support, a high-quality HD+ display, and AI-enhanced cameras make it a great mid-range choice.

name: Infinix Hot 40i (4+4GB RAM, 128GB)
description: The Infinix Hot 40i offers extended RAM (4GB + 4GB) and 128GB storage for enhanced performance. With AI-powered cameras and a stylish design, it is a perfect balance between power and affordability.

name: Infinix Smart 6 Plus (Miracle Black)
description: The Infinix Smart 6 Plus in Miracle Black offers stylish looks and practical performance. Ideal for users who need essential smartphone features at a great value.

name: OPPO Reno11 5G (12GB RAM, 256GB Storage)
description: The OPPO Reno11 5G combines premium design with powerful performance. With 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a 120Hz AMOLED display, it is ideal for gaming, streaming, and photography enthusiasts.

name: Puma Sports Backpack
description: Durable and lightweight Puma backpack, designed for sports and daily use. Spacious compartments and ergonomic design make it ideal for gym, school, or travel.

name: Kids Educational Toy Blocks Set (120 pcs)
description: A colorful 120-piece educational block set designed to enhance creativity, problem-solving, and motor skills in kids. Safe, non-toxic, and suitable for children aged 3+.

name: Men's Casual Cotton T-Shirt
description: A comfortable and breathable casual cotton T-shirt for men. Perfect for daily wear, gym, or outdoor activities. Designed with a modern fit and soft-touch fabric.

name: Women's Elegant Evening Dress
description: An elegant evening dress designed for special occasions. Made with premium fabric for comfort and style, perfect for weddings, parties, or formal dinners.

name: Wooden Office Desk with Drawers
description: A modern wooden office desk with multiple drawers for storage. Strong, durable, and perfect for both home and office setups.

name: Comfortable Recliner Sofa Chair
description: A luxurious recliner sofa chair designed for maximum comfort. Perfect for living rooms, home theaters, or offices.

name: Adidas Running Shoes

name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone (Book 1)
description: The first book in the world-famous Harry Potter series. A magical journey begins as Harry discovers his identity as a wizard.

name: Atomic Habits by James Clear
description: Bestselling self-help book by James Clear. Atomic Habits reveals strategies to build good habits, break bad ones, and master small behaviors that lead to remarkable results.

description: LEGO Classic Creative Bricks set with 500+ pieces in multiple colors. Encourages creativity, imagination, and problem-solving skills in kids.

name: Remote Control Racing Car
description: High-speed remote control racing car with durable design and long battery life. Perfect for kids and hobbyists who enjoy racing toys.

description: Flagship Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max with a large 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display, A17 Pro performance, and a pro-grade camera system for professional photography and video.

description: ASUS ROG Strix — high-performance gaming laptop for gamers and content creators, balanced between raw GPU power and a fast high-refresh display.

CPU: Intel Core i7 / AMD Ryzen 7 (varies by SKU)

description: LEGO Star Wars Millennium Falcon set with thousands of pieces to build the iconic spaceship from the Star Wars saga. Perfect for collectors and fans.

description: Durable 10-piece stainless steel cookware set including pots, pans, and lids. Designed for everyday cooking with even heat distribution.

description: Elegant ceramic dinnerware set with 24 pieces, perfect for family meals and gatherings. Durable and dishwasher safe.

name: The Psychology of Money - Morgan Housel
description: Bestselling personal finance book by Morgan Housel, exploring timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness.

description: Complete Harry Potter book series (7 volumes) by J.K. Rowling in a collector’s box set. A must-have for fantasy lovers.

name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max redefines smartphone performance with its A17 Pro Bionic chip, pro-level camera system, and sleek titanium frame. Built for professionals and creators who demand power, speed, and stunning visuals.
specifications: Chip: A17 Pro Bionic with 6-core GPU
Battery Life: Up to 29 hours video playback

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40
description: The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40 is designed for comfort, durability, and speed. Featuring responsive cushioning and a lightweight build, this running shoe adapts to both casual joggers and professional athletes.
specifications: Cushioning: Zoom Air units in forefoot and heel
Outsole: Durable rubber with waffle pattern
Fit: True to size, lace-up design
Available Colors: Black, White, Blue, Red

name: Essence Mascara Lash Princess
description: Essence Mascara Lash Princess is designed to give your lashes a dramatic lift, intense volume, and a fanned-out look. Its lightweight formula prevents clumping and ensures long-lasting wear throughout the day.
specifications: Brush Type: Hourglass-shaped brush for precise application
usage: Apply from root to tip using a zigzag motion. Repeat for more volume. Can be layered without clumping.

name: Eyeshadow Palette with Mirror
description: A compact eyeshadow palette featuring a range of matte and shimmer shades, perfect for creating day-to-night eye looks. Comes with a built-in mirror for easy on-the-go application.
usage: Apply shades using brushes or fingertips. Blend for gradient effect. Suitable for layering or mixing colors.

name: Powder Canister
description: A finely milled powder canister that provides a smooth, matte finish. Helps control shine and sets makeup for all-day wear, suitable for all skin types.
usage: Apply lightly with a fluffy brush over foundation to set makeup. Can be used for touch-ups during the day.

name: Red Lipstick
description: Classic red lipstick with a creamy, long-lasting formula. Provides intense color and hydration to lips while maintaining a smooth, non-drying finish.
usage: Apply directly on lips from center to edges. Use a lip brush for precise application. Reapply as needed.

name: Red Nail Polish
description: Bright red nail polish with high-gloss finish. Quick-drying and long-lasting, perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.
specifications: Application: Smooth brush for even coverage
Longevity: Up to 7 days without chipping
usage: Apply two thin coats on clean nails. Allow to dry between coats. Finish with topcoat for longer durability.

name: Calvin Klein CK One
description: CK One by Calvin Klein is a timeless unisex fragrance with fresh, clean notes. Suitable for casual and formal occasions, it leaves a subtle yet captivating scent.
usage: Spray on pulse points: wrists, neck, and behind ears. Reapply as needed.

name: Chanel Coco Noir Eau De
description: Chanel Coco Noir is a luxurious evening fragrance with deep oriental floral notes. Perfect for special occasions or a glamorous night out.
specifications: Base Notes: Patchouli, Tonka Bean, Vanilla
usage: Spray on pulse points: neck, wrists, and inner elbows for an elegant aroma.

name: Dior J'adore
description: Dior J'adore is an iconic floral fragrance that combines elegance and sensuality. Its rich bouquet is ideal for daytime or evening wear.
usage: Apply to pulse points and hair for a lasting fragrance. Avoid rubbing the scent.

name: Dolce Shine Eau de
description: Dolce Shine Eau de is a sweet and light fragrance designed for everyday wear. Its bright floral notes create a fresh and uplifting mood.
usage: Spray lightly on neck and wrists for a fresh, all-day scent.

name: Gucci Bloom Eau de
description: Gucci Bloom Eau de Parfum is a rich floral fragrance capturing the essence of a blooming garden. Perfect for elegant occasions or daily luxury.
usage: Apply on pulse points, neck, and inner elbows. Ideal for evening wear.

name: Annibale Colombo Bed
description: Premium Annibale Colombo Bed, crafted with high-quality wood and upholstery. Provides both elegance and comfort to any bedroom.
specifications: Material: Solid wood with premium fabric
usage: Assemble following the instructions. Use a mattress of compatible size for best comfort.

name: Annibale Colombo Sofa
description: Stylish and comfortable Annibale Colombo Sofa made from premium leather and solid wood frame. Perfect for living rooms or lounges.
usage: Place in living room. Avoid direct sunlight for longevity. Clean with appropriate leather cleaner.

name: Knoll Saarinen Executive Conference Chair
description: Ergonomic and stylish executive chair from Knoll Saarinen. Designed for comfort during long meetings or office hours with premium cushioning and support.
usage: Adjust seat height and backrest for comfort. Suitable for office or conference rooms.

name: Wooden Bathroom Sink With Mirror
description: Elegant wooden bathroom sink cabinet with a matching mirror. Combines modern design with functionality for a clean and stylish bathroom setup.
usage: Install in bathroom. Ensure water connections are secure. Clean regularly to maintain finish.

name: Apple
description: Fresh and juicy apples, perfect for a healthy snack or adding to recipes. Sourced from high-quality orchards for premium taste.
usage: Wash before consumption. Can be eaten raw or used in desserts and salads.

name: JavaScript
description: Comprehensive guide to JavaScript programming by David Flanagan, covering fundamentals, advanced techniques, and practical examples for web developers.

name: JavaScript
description: An insightful JavaScript book by Douglas Crockford and collaborators, exploring best practices, design patterns, and modern JavaScript techniques.

specifications.Author: Douglas Crockford, Ke luo ke fu de, Yan xue kun

name: Eloquent JavaScript
description: A modern introduction to programming using JavaScript, emphasizing clear examples, practical exercises, and hands-on projects to build strong coding skills.

name: JavaScript and jQuery
description: Learn to enhance web pages with interactivity using JavaScript and jQuery by Jon Duckett, with practical examples and visually rich explanations.

name: Javascript
description: A practical guide to JavaScript programming techniques and applications by Andy Vickler, covering real-world examples and hands-on coding exercises.

name: Learning PHP, MySQL & JavaScript
description: Hands-on guide combining PHP, MySQL, and JavaScript for building dynamic, database-driven web applications with practical examples.

name: JavaScript
description: Clear and concise introduction to JavaScript concepts and practical coding examples by Don Gosselin, suitable for beginners.

name: JavaScript for Dummies
description: Beginner-friendly guide to learning JavaScript by Emily A. Vander Veer, providing step-by-step instructions, examples, and exercises.

name: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs (SICP)
description: Classic computer science textbook introducing fundamental programming concepts using Scheme. Covers abstraction, recursion, interpreters, and modular programming principles.

specifications.Authors: Harold Abelson, Gerald Jay Sussman, Julie Sussman

name: JavaScript Bible
description: JavaScript Bible is a comprehensive reference guide for web developers and programmers. It covers JavaScript language features, browser scripting, DOM manipulation, and advanced techniques. Ideal for beginners and experienced developers who want to deepen their understanding and improve coding efficiency.

name: Python Cookbook
description: Python Cookbook provides practical recipes and solutions for Python programming. Covering data structures, algorithms, networking, and application development, it is ideal for intermediate to advanced programmers seeking effective techniques and best practices.

specifications.Authors: Alex Martelli, David Ascher, David Beazley, Brian K. Jones

name: Beginning JavaScript
description: Beginning JavaScript is an introductory guide for newcomers to the language. It includes examples, exercises, and practical projects to build a solid foundation in JavaScript programming and web development.

name: Chanel No.5
description: Chanel No.5 is a timeless and classic floral fragrance for women. Combining fresh aldehydes, rich floral notes, and a powdery base, it exudes elegance and sophistication. Perfect for special occasions, evening wear, and as a signature scent for those who love luxury and refinement.

specifications.Notes: Aldehydes, Ylang-Ylang, Neroli, Jasmine, Rose, Lily of the Valley, Sandalwood, Vetiver, Vanilla, Amber

name: Dior Sauvage
description: Dior Sauvage is a fresh and powerful fragrance for men, blending citrusy and spicy top notes with a woody and aromatic base. Ideal for daily wear, casual outings, or evening events, it embodies modern masculinity and confidence.

specifications.Notes: Bergamot, Pepper, Geranium, Lavender, Ambroxan, Cedar

name: Acqua Di Gio
description: Acqua Di Gio is a refreshing aquatic fragrance for men, perfect for everyday and summer wear. Light and airy, it features notes of citrus, jasmine, and woody undertones, making it an invigorating and versatile scent.

specifications.Notes: Bergamot, Lime, Jasmine, Nutmeg, Coriander, Cedar, Patchouli, White Musk

name: Flowerbomb
description: Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb is a luxurious floral fragrance for women. Bold, romantic, and elegant, it combines bergamot, tea, jasmine, orange blossom, orchid, and patchouli for a memorable scent. Ideal for evening and romantic occasions.

specifications.Notes: Bergamot, Tea, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Orchid, Patchouli

name: Gucci Bloom
description: Gucci Bloom is a fresh and modern floral fragrance for women. Inspired by a flourishing garden, it combines jasmine, Rangoon creeper, and tuberose for a natural and elegant scent. Suitable for daily wear, spring, and summer occasions.

name: Tom Ford Black Orchid
description: Tom Ford Black Orchid is a luxurious unisex fragrance with a dark, opulent character. Featuring notes of black truffle, ylang-ylang, bergamot, black orchid, patchouli, and vanilla, it is ideal for formal evening events and sophisticated occasions.

specifications.Notes: Black Truffle, Ylang-Ylang, Bergamot, Black Orchid, Patchouli, Vanilla

name: Versace Eros
description: Versace Eros is a bold and vibrant fragrance for men, inspired by Greek mythology. Fresh mint, green apple, and lemon top notes combine with tonka bean, vanilla, and vetiver for a passionate and charismatic scent. Perfect for evening wear and parties.

specifications.Notes: Mint, Green Apple, Lemon, Tonka Bean, Vanilla, Vetiver

name: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium
description: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium is a seductive and intense fragrance designed for women who love evening elegance. With captivating notes of coffee, vanilla, and white flowers, it offers a warm, energizing scent perfect for night-time events, parties, or romantic occasions. The luxurious aroma leaves a lasting impression and embodies sophistication and confidence.

name: Bleu de Chanel
description: Bleu de Chanel is a refined and sophisticated fragrance for men, featuring citrus, woody, and incense notes. Suitable for daily wear, office, or formal occasions, it exudes elegance and confidence. The fresh top notes combined with a rich woody base create a versatile scent that is timeless and universally appealing.

specifications.Notes: Lemon, Mint, Pink Pepper, Grapefruit, Ginger, Sandalwood, Cedar

name: Creed Aventus
description: Creed Aventus is an iconic masculine fragrance celebrated for its powerful and confident scent. Featuring fruity top notes of pineapple, bergamot, and blackcurrant, combined with smoky birch and earthy patchouli, it is perfect for evening events and special occasions. Aventus symbolizes ambition, sophistication, and charisma for men who want to make a statement.

specifications.Notes: Pineapple, Bergamot, Blackcurrant, Birch, Patchouli, Musk

name: Jo Malone Peony & Blush Suede
description: Jo Malone Peony & Blush Suede is an elegant and light floral fragrance for women, perfect for daytime wear or casual events. Featuring notes of peony, red apple, jasmine, and carnation, it delivers a fresh and sophisticated scent. Ideal for spring and summer, this fragrance brings a soft, romantic aura to everyday life.

name: Hermès Terre d'Hermès

specifications.Notes: Orange, Grapefruit, Pepper, Pelargonium, Vetiver, Cedar, Patchouli

name: LEGO Classic Bricks
description: LEGO Classic Bricks is a colorful building block set designed for children aged 4 and up. With 221 high-quality ABS plastic pieces, kids can build houses, vehicles, animals, and other imaginative creations. This set encourages problem-solving, creativity, hand-eye coordination, and spatial awareness, making it a perfect tool for educational and playful learning.

specifications.Educational Value: Enhances creativity, spatial awareness, motor skills, and imaginative play

name: Barbie Dreamhouse
description: Barbie Dreamhouse is a three-story dollhouse featuring an elevator, modern furniture, and fun accessories for children aged 3 and up. It encourages role-playing, storytelling, and imaginative adventures. Children can create real-life scenarios, improving social skills, creativity, and cognitive development through engaging play.

specifications.Educational Value: Develops social skills, creativity, storytelling, and imaginative play

name: Hot Wheels Track Set
description: Hot Wheels Track Set offers loops, curves, and multiple cars for thrilling racing fun. Designed for children aged 5 and up, it encourages problem-solving, creativity, and engineering skills. Kids can build different track configurations, compete with friends, and develop fine motor coordination and spatial awareness.

specifications.Educational Value: Enhances engineering skills, creativity, hand-eye coordination, and problem-solving

name: Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn
description: Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn is an interactive educational toy for infants aged 6 months and up. Featuring buttons, lights, and songs, it teaches letters, numbers, colors, and shapes. This toy encourages cognitive development, language skills, and sensory stimulation while providing fun and engaging play.

specifications.Educational Value: Supports early learning, sensory development, language skills, and cognitive growth

name: Melissa & Doug Wooden Puzzles
description: Melissa & Doug Wooden Puzzles set contains colorful and durable puzzle pieces featuring animals, vehicles, and numbers. Designed for children aged 3 and up, it promotes problem-solving, hand-eye coordination, patience, and cognitive skills. The tactile wooden pieces offer a safe and engaging learning experience.

specifications.Educational Value: Enhances cognitive development, fine motor skills, patience, and problem-solving abilities

name: Play-Doh Modeling Compound
description: Play-Doh Modeling Compound offers a colorful and safe clay set for endless creative sculpting and imaginative play. Designed for children aged 3 and up, this set encourages fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and artistic expression. With multiple vibrant colors included, children can create unique shapes, characters, and imaginative designs, fostering both creativity and cognitive development.

specifications.Educational Value: Boosts creativity, hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, and imaginative thinking

name: VTech Kidizoom Camera
description: The VTech Kidizoom Camera is a durable and kid-friendly digital camera that allows children aged 3 and up to explore photography and video recording. Equipped with fun photo effects, games, and video functions, it helps develop creativity, imagination, and technological skills. The lightweight design ensures easy handling, making it a perfect introduction to digital media for young learners.

specifications.Educational Value: Enhances creativity, technological skills, and imagination

name: Crayola Art Set
description: Crayola Art Set is a complete kit including crayons, markers, colored pencils, and paper to inspire creativity in children aged 4 and up. Perfect for home or school use, this set encourages artistic skills, fine motor development, and imaginative expression. Children can explore color combinations, shading, and drawing techniques, fostering both confidence and artistic growth.

specifications.Educational Value: Improves creativity, color recognition, fine motor skills, and self-expression

name: Monopoly Board Game
description: Monopoly Board Game is a classic family game designed for children aged 8 and up, offering fun while teaching strategic thinking, money management, and social skills. Players can buy, sell, and trade properties while learning negotiation, decision-making, and planning. This game encourages quality family time and friendly competition, making it a timeless educational and entertaining activity.

specifications.Educational Value: Develops strategic thinking, math skills, social interaction, and decision-making

name: NERF Elite Blaster
description: The NERF Elite Blaster provides exciting foam dart play for children aged 8 and up. Designed for high-performance shooting, it promotes active play, hand-eye coordination, and tactical thinking. The blaster includes foam darts and encourages outdoor fun, friendly competition, and physical activity, making it both entertaining and developmental.

specifications.Educational Value: Improves physical activity, coordination, tactical thinking, and aim

name: Fisher-Price Little People Farm
description: Fisher-Price Little People Farm is an interactive playset for children aged 2 and up. Featuring a barn, tractor, and farm animals, it promotes imaginative play and early learning about animals and farm environments. Children can role-play farming activities, enhancing creativity, social skills, and knowledge about nature and daily life on a farm.

specifications.Educational Value: Enhances imagination, social skills, and knowledge of animals and farm life

name: Magic Cube (Rubik's Cube)
description: The 3x3 Magic Cube (Rubik's Cube) is a classic puzzle toy for children aged 6 and up, enhancing problem-solving, critical thinking, and spatial reasoning skills. Ideal for solo challenges and competitions, it encourages patience, memory, and cognitive development. A fun and stimulating activity that combines learning with entertainment.

specifications.Educational Value: Develops critical thinking, problem-solving, memory, and patience

name: Playmobil Pirate Ship
description: Playmobil Pirate Ship is a detailed playset for children aged 4 and up, featuring figures, accessories, and a ship for imaginative adventures. Encourages storytelling, creativity, role-playing, and social interaction. Children can create pirate-themed scenarios, fostering teamwork, problem-solving, and imaginative thinking.

specifications.Educational Value: Enhances creativity, storytelling, social skills, and imaginative play

name: Fisher-Price Rock-a-Stack
description: Fisher-Price Rock-a-Stack is a classic stacking ring toy for infants aged 6 months and up. Promotes hand-eye coordination, color recognition, and problem-solving skills. Designed with bright colors and varying sizes, it helps young children develop motor skills, spatial awareness, and early learning in a fun and engaging way.

specifications.Educational Value: Enhances motor skills, hand-eye coordination, color recognition, and problem-solving

name: Tonka Steel Classic Dump Truck
description: Tonka Steel Classic Dump Truck is a durable toy for children aged 3 and up. Made of steel and plastic, it withstands active outdoor play while promoting imaginative construction activities. Children can load, dump, and build, developing creativity, motor skills, and cooperative play. Perfect for outdoor adventures and hands-on learning experiences.

specifications.Educational Value: Promotes creativity, motor skills, cooperative play, and imaginative construction

name: LEGO Friends Heartlake City
description: LEGO Friends Heartlake City is a creative building set for children aged 6 and up, including mini-doll figures, buildings, and accessories. Encourages imaginative role-play, storytelling, and creative construction. Children can build, decorate, and enact everyday scenarios, fostering teamwork, problem-solving, and creativity in a playful learning environment.

specifications.Educational Value: Develops creativity, teamwork, problem-solving, and imaginative play
